news_header: Employment pensions will rise by 1.3% next year as confirmed by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Health.
news_text: The Ministry of Social Affairs and Health has announced that employment pensions will increase by 1.3% next year. This increase is based on the confirmed earnings-related pension index, which is calculated using 20% of wages and 80% of price changes. Additionally, the salary factor for future earnings-related pensions has also been established.
